title: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi X Jiong Tegong
synopsis: This story is characterized by several boxes of many game types in one, taking many familiar game types as the blueprint of the story, allowing the protagonists to form a secret agent group with the code name X as the secret code, and enrich it in the underground ice world full of unlimited fun A legendary adventure. Weird animals and plants from all over the world will grow here, such as human-eating bacteria trees, tofu will grow like bacteria and turn into cows to gnaw the land and so on. Here, there will be chasing bacteria riders, Dousi and the others become rock riders, here, there are also weird flying bacteria fish and so on. The protagonists experience danger and grow up in public here. (translated from iqiyi)

Prequel.name: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi Dou Si Niu Yu Gui Huli

Sequel.name: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi Shenmi Guodu
